title: Ball tracking (learned detector input) with explicit missing/unknown semantics
scope: Track the ball conservatively using learned detector candidates as input.
Emit explicit per-frame pos_state semantics (present/missing/unknown), no hallucination.
Emit quality metrics used by events/highlights.
acceptance: tracks.jsonl contains ball records for every frame with explicit pos_state.
present ball records require gated evidence; missing/unknown include reasons.
Diagnostics/quality_summary includes ball visibility and missing-run metrics.

deliverables.title: Ball tracker integration and quality metrics
acceptance: Tracker emits explicit missing/unknown semantics per frame.
Quality metrics are deterministic and surfaced in diagnostics.

subtasks.title: Integrate learned detector candidates into the tracker and harden semantics.
done_when: tracker.py accepts learned detections and emits explicit pos_state per frame.
Missing/unknown reasons are stable and validated.
